verses.verse: הַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> O praise אֶת־ <WH853> יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> all ye nations שַׁ֝בְּח֗וּהוּ <WH7623> praise כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֻמִּֽים׃ <WH523> him all ye people

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for גָ֘בַ֤ר <WH1396> is great עָלֵ֨ינוּ ׀ <WH5921> toward חַסְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> For his merciful וֶֽאֱמֶת־ <WH571> toward us and the truth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
